thread.title: A delightful and excellently-run hotel
thread.title_full: A delightful and excellently-run hotel - Review of Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TibetTrader
title: A delightful and excellently-run hotel
text:
The Hotel Brighton is located in an excellent part of Paris - close to so many iconic and wonderful tourist spots. The hotel is extremely well-run (we have stayed here a few times previously) and can recommend it without reservation.
The staff are simply first rate - nothing is too much trouble, they are charming, efficient and professional - and have perfect English (our French being primitive if enthusiastic!)
Rooms and facilities are very good. Beds are comfortable, breakfast great fun and views simply stunning. The Mus√©e D'Orsay, Eiffel Tower, Tuillery Gardens and Louvre are just THERE!
You will not be disappointed. We are already looking forward to our next visit.
Room Tip: Seek view overlooking there Tuilerie Gardens See more room tips
